name: CB Responsive jQuery Accordion
author: Md Abul Bashar

sections.description:
Esay Full Responsive jQuery FAQ Accordion, just go to FAQ post, and add new FAQ. and use this shortcode [cb-jquery-faq] in any pages or posts. then enjoy it.

  • Documentations: shortcode is [cb-jquery-faq].

  • if you want to use in any template just use this code

  • Default view latest 10 post.

  • Show Manually Post Count of 5 post (just add count=”5″). full code cb-jquery-faq [cb-jquery-faq count=”5″] with third bracket.

  • and support all post type, just use posttype=”your post name”

Demo Link for Premium Version

Buy Premium Version

  • Demo Link: http://www.codingbank.com/plugins/cb-responsive-jquery-accordion
  • Our Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/linuxhostlab
  • Our Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/codingbank

Full Documentations

You can watch this video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D9JUu3YiyF8

Premium Version Features

*Responsive

*Custom Post with shortcode support.

*Full Color Customization

*Custom Title,

*Custom Contents,

*Border color,

*Box shadow px and color,

*Title background color,

*Title text color,

*Contents text color,

*Contents background color.

  • And More………..

by using the SHORTCODE of this plugin. It is the most flexible and easy way to use on your website.

We’ll cover enough areas of the shortcode usage for you to control the plugin effectively. WordPress CB Responsive jQuery Accordion Pro is a Highly customizable jQuery plugin for your WordPress website. This plugin have user friendly admin panel. You can change everything from options panel. Lets begin:

shortcode lists:

title: For show faq title text.

text: for show faq contents.

brcolor: for change default border color.

boxshadowpx: for change default box shadow pixel

boxshadowcolor: for change default box shadow color

tbgcolor: for change default title background color.

ttextcolor: for change default title text color.

ctextcolor: for change default contents color

cbgcolor: for change default contents background color.

icp: for change default plus icon color.

icm: for change default minus icon color
sections.installation:
example:

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  • Documentations: shortcode is [cb-jquery-faq].

  • Default view latest 10 post.

  • Show Manually Post Count of 5 post (just add count=”5″). full code cb-jquery-faq [cb-jquery-faq count=”5″] with third bracket.

  • and support all post type, just use posttype=”your post name”

  • Demo Link: http://www.codingbank.com/plugins/cb-responsive-jquery-accordion
sections.faq:
How to Install This Plugin?

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

How to Use This Plugin?

  • just go to faq post, and add new accordion . and use this shortcode [cb-jquery-faq] in any pages or posts. then enjoy it.
  • Demo Link: http://www.codingbank.com/plugins/cb-responsive-jquery-accordion
